title: CardSec 🔒
description: There is a need for a 101 stake pool security guide and testing tools for stake pool owners and dApps running Cardano nodes.
solution: CardSec is aiming to build guides and open-source testing tools solely for Cardano stake pools and dApps running Cardano nodes.
experience: Cyber Security and Threat Intel enthusiast. Certified intern from one of the top Cyber Cell HQs in India in various domains of CyberSec.
